info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 28 at 8:57AM EDT until August 28 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WICTHER CREEK, CEDAR GROVE, AND CHELYAN... ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY FOR CENTRAL KANAWHA COUNTY... At 857 AM EDT, Radar estimates and gauge reports indicate between 3 and 6 inches of rain has fallen this morning. Several creeks have been reported out of their banks including Slaughters Creek in Chelyan, Kellys Creek in Cedar Grove, and Witcher Creek, where a water rescue was occurring. Emergency management officials reported flooding in the Cabin Creek along with a mudslide which has closed both lanes of U.S. Route 60 in Cedar Grove This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Wicther Creek, Cedar Grove, and Chelyan. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and Emergency management reported. IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Cedar Grove, East Bank and Glasgow. Rain is beginning to decrease in intensity, but runoff will continue to result in dangerous flash flooding. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.Heavy rain producing flash flooding.
